objection: Online timings are hard to follow.
response: All of our online live classes can be viewed in recorded form according to ones timing and own pace.

response: Our institue is better on various fronts like teaching faculty, extermely competitve pricing, one on one mentorship, rewarding discounts based on performace.

objection: Do you provide support for weaker students?
response: Yes, we have remedial classes and special attention for students who need additional support.

objection: What is the success rate of the institute?
response: Our institute has a proven track record with many of our students securing top ranks in JEE and NEET over the years.

objection: Do you offer guidance for board exams as well?
response: Yes, we integrate board exam preparation into our courses to ensure excellent performance in board exam.

response: Yes, we conduct extra classes and workshops for critical topics and exam strategies.
